column4: Anyone w/ an ATI X1400 in here who accomplished running beryl/compiz ?
Running x800 and cant get beryl/compiz to run, followed this guide tho http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Feisty_Installation_Guide
My ATI driver works fine. But Compiz has to be disabled ... :-/ any way to circumvent compiz
what should be in / out of there? Composite has to be disabled, some websites and some errors on my laptop say.
well, I yould start compiz a while ago with dapper or edgy in combination w/ XGL, perhaps you could try that - but it doesn't work here in feisty :/
